text: "I'll Make It All Up to You" is a song written by Charlie Rich and originally recorded by Jerry Lee Lewis, who released it as a single, with "Break-Up" on the other side, in 1958 on Sun Records. == Track listing == == Charts == {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !align="center"|Chart (1958) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"| U.S. Cash Box Country Singles | 34 |} == References == Category:1958 songs Category:1958 singles Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Sun Records singles Category:Rock-and-roll songs Category:Songs written by Charlie Rich
title: I'll Make It All Up to You
